org.middleheaven.process.progress
Interface Progress

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ControlableProgress
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractProgress, BoundProgress, ExternalControlledProgress, WaitProgress
public interface Progress
extends java.io.Serializable

Tracks a process progress.

Method Detail

isTerminated

boolean isTerminated()
Returns:
true if the process is terminated, false otherwise

interrupt

void interrupt()
Interrupts the process, if possible.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if was not possible to interrupt the process.

isInterruptable

boolean isInterruptable()
Returns:
true if the underlying process can be interrupted, false otherwise

stepsCount

int stepsCount()
Returns:
the process steps count. Returns a negative number if the quantity of steps is unkown.

getCurrentStepIndex

int getCurrentStepIndex()
Returns:
current step number. Zero means the process is yet to start.

getCurrentStepDescription

java.lang.CharSequence getCurrentStepDescription()
Returns:
current step description

increment

void increment()
Increment the current step by one.

void addProgressListener(ProgressListener observer)

removeProgressListener

void removeProgressListener(ProgressListener observer)
